meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with iritis after noticing redness in her eye.
meanings.sent2: Iritis can cause discomfort and affect vision if not treated promptly.
meanings.sent3: When the iritis made her eye look like a tomato, she knew she needed medical attention.
meanings.sent4: The iritis was a fiery storm raging within her eye, causing her great discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant redness of the iritis made her eye resemble a blooming rose.

meanings.definition: An eye condition characterized by redness, pain, and sensitivity to light.
meanings.sent1: His iritis caused him to squint in bright light due to the sensitivity of his eyes.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed eye drops to alleviate the symptoms of iritis.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her iritis turned her into a vampire, avoiding sunlight at all costs.
meanings.sent4: The iritis was a painful reminder of the fragility of his eyesight.
meanings.sent5: The intense pain of the iritis made him realize the importance of eye health.
